content:
Command Comments

  • Requirement

    • Add A String or URL to any Method
    • No Defined Retrieval Mechanism

  • Suggested Implementation

    • A Header

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version

Notes:

    Command comments allows one to associate a string or a URL with any Method. This is critical for Check Outs and Puts. If we choose to implement attributes as I suggested then we can perform this action through them. Otherwise a Command Comments header is needed. As others may not need this functionality at all this is a perfect argument for attributes and a good argument for generic header extensibility.
